title: Emerald & Zirconia Chandbali Earrings - Pachala Kempu Jhumka
materials: Cultured Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Exquisite Chandbali design with a cascading arrangement of floral motifs, each intricately set with sparkling cubic zirconia stones. Features square-cut emerald simulants at the top and mid-section. Dainty pearl drops at the bottom enhance the traditional Jhumka look. The gold plating is expertly applied to create a rich, timeless aesthetic.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase a touch of traditional elegance. Also suitable for formal evening events.
description: These earrings perfectly blend traditional South Indian design with modern appeal. The emerald simulants add a regal touch, while the cubic zirconia stones provide exceptional sparkle. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, and the durable Hyderabadi polish guarantees long-lasting beauty. A statement piece that's sure to turn heads!
